pageTitle: Versace Peep Toe Platform Pumps | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements FIT: True to European sizing. Size & Fit Platform: 1.25in / 30mm Heel: 5.5in / 140mm MEASUREMENTS Made in Italy. Leather: Calfskin. Metallic patent leather makes a glamorous statement on a sleek pair of elegant, peep-toe pumps from Versace. A two-tone platform lends a comfortable lift, and the covered heel is tapered for a sculpted finish. Leather sole. Description Versace Pumps > Versace Shoes > Pumps > Shoes > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer In 1978, Gianni Versace created a design house that merged high fashion with art, celebrity, and theater. Today, the label known for its streamlined, goddess-worthy silhouettes and sensual expression remains one of the world's most recognized luxury brands. Under the creative direction of Donatella Versace, the house continues to design and produce haute couture, womenswear, menswear, jewelry, and home interiors, all while staying true to the original aesthetic that imbues each Versace creation. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
